Introduction

Shim Jayoon, known under her stage name Yoon, is a South Korean singer-songwriter under High Up Entertainment. She is best known as one of the lead vocalists of the girl group STAYC.

She debuted as a member of STAYC on November 12, 2020 with their first single album "Star To A Young Culture".
